name: Triumvirate
flavorText: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.
flavorTextHtml: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Your Signature Spells increase the damage of Arcane Orb by 375% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. (Wizard Only) [300 - 400]%
